data.title: What is the most beautiful Arabic poem?
data.meta_description:
Answer (1 of 12): Here's my translation of a poem I adore:

The Cup Reader

With fear in her eyes, she sat

examining my cup.

" I've read so many cups, son,

but never seen such sadness as yours,

don't panic . Love is your destiny,

but your skies are rainy , and your way is blocked,

your skie...
